description: Pre-fermentation cold soak at 10°C for 6-12 hours to enhance aromatics
Bring must to 14-16°C for fermentation start
Inoculate with EC1118 or VL1 yeast. Use 20g/hL
Add DAP at 1/3 sugar depletion (~15 Brix). Apply 75 mg/L
Check fermentation vigor, color of wine
Add yeast nutrient if fermentation slow. Apply Fermaid K 0.5g/L
Final gravity check (<1 Brix for dry Chardonnay)
Add SO2 after fermentation complete. Target 30-40 mg/L free SO2
Allow settling at 10-12°C for 1-2 weeks before racking
Rack off gross lees after settling
Inoculate with malolactic bacteria (recommended for Chardonnay). Use Oenococcus oeni
Monitor MLF progress (decreasing malic acid levels)
